Pre-Game Insights: Ghana's bid for a fifth Africa Cup of Nations title begins on Sunday, when they take on Cape Verde in the second game of Group B.
Ghana was humbled at AFCON 2021, exiting at the group stage, and is keen to outdo that ignominious exit this time.
Cape Verde should fear nothing in Sunday's fixture, with the Blue Sharks the type of opponent to make the Black Stars uncomfortable if they apply themselves appropriately.
Bubista leads the Portuguese-speaking nation to another finals, having managed the side to a round of 16 place at AFCON 2021.
While a 2-0 loss to Tunisia in their tune-up fixture was far from ideal, the Blue Sharks know their opponents are under more pressure to secure maximum points in Sunday's game.
